Nighlight:

Nighlight invited to sit at Rodimus with a gesture "It was very  
annoy... I... when I was Pred I wished to prove that I was the best 
and I thought that... that could do that Hydras doesn't take me in 
count... altough, in somehow MAxima was babysitting me too, but not 
always she told me what was going on and try to apart me of 
something... Sometimes, she acted very strange... Altough, from 
beginning of all, Hydras and Perceptor acted strange too  "
